text: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard for Teenagers Offers a Golden Surfing in Autumn Autumn is the beautiful season. It is not hot like summer or cold like winter. All plants turn into golden. Therefore, many people start to be lively and firmly grasp this hard-won chance to enjoy the beautiful autumn. When it comes to skateboard lovers, M3 electric skateboard, a new arrival of Airwheel, gives them a golden surfing on land. USA, 26 October 2015 -- Autumn is the beautiful season. It is not hot like summer or cold like winter. All plants turn into golden and thus autumn is also called golden season. Therefore, many people start to be lively and firmly grasp this hard-won chance to enjoy the beautiful autumn. When it comes to skateboard lovers, M3 electric skateboard , a new arrival of Airwheel, gives them a golden surfing on land. Fancy appearance of Airwheel M3 electric skateboard is the very first advantage when compared with ordinary skateboards. Its board is completely hand-made and thus the figure line is much smoother. Meanwhile, many different DIY stickers can be applied to M3 electric skateboard, which largely increases the sense of fashion. Under the board, there is power unit, shock-absorbing system, automatic steering-sensor system, remote control device and tyres. In order to make sure high-efficiency and stable skateboarding, Airwheel M3 skateboard adopts modular design. That is to say, a dysfunctional part wonâ€™t affect the normal running of the whole system. Speaking of power unit, Airwheel M3 is equipped with advanced SONY lithium-ion battery, which guarantees steady power supply and long working life. More importantly, the adopted aerospace attitude control theory, fuzzy software algorithm and gyroscope system let users control M3 easily and freely.What Airwheel M3 motorized skateboard can be used for? For skateboard enthusiasts, they can hold a skateboarding match in this pleasant autumn. Intelligent Airwheel M3 makes all of high-difficulty skating skills, like the Aerial, the Inert and the Ollie, be finished more easily. For those young boys and girls who love to weave on the streets, Airwheel M3 absolutely is the very first choice. Airwheel M3 also can be used as exercise equipment. Skateboarding is helpful to train the coordinating ability, self-balancing ability and flexibility of four limbs and all body muscles. All in all, Airwheel M3 will make this autumn livelier. # # #
